channel.title: Bouncy Balls
channel.description:
Check out this animation, unlike that LSD one, you can do more than watch, click and drag around, go crazy, it has a form with mouse events, randomly colored balls,
hopefully this will help some of you learn canvasses and forms, and maybe you will have enough to rep me
enjoy!

item.title: Bouncy Balls
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

Line 1: [Error] (1:1): Unable to register function Function CreateTPAFromBMP( BmpDC : HDC) : TPointArray; in script C:\Documents and Settings\Nakeysaw\Local Settings\Temporary Internet Files\Content.IE5\T15OMCKM\BouncyBalls[1].scar

this has happened in every script i attempted to run!

Read full topic

item.title: Bouncy Balls
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

yakman:

[quote]Why, what is so bad about it?

most of the time, the reply is something like “cause its crap”

a lot of the time its people who know java, then think that the only way to auto is making deobs, loaders, bcel or whatever it is nowdays

well let me tell you, you lot have a huge ban rate, you almost use level 3s all the time, iv heard even arga had a big ban rate, but with scar, iv seen a guy who had 4 level 85 miners, looking like normal legit players, high combat and everything.
we try to tell you about way to help, like the SRL Multiplayer Model, im sure if people used that, instead of one account for 5 days, you’d never get banned, come on, java is object oriented, you’re born for it

and if you mention scar on the IRC, you get flamed so badly… its not even funny, and if anyone says something, it doesnt even matter cause its only a scar scripter saying it…
however i accept your opinion, we here are only ye olde scar-color-clicky[/quote]

The people who flame you are the people who are not interested in ban-rates, because they don’t cheat. They are the people who are interested in devising new and interesting effective cheating methods, for the challenge and/or epeen. Scar is old, inefficient and non-interesting.

A difference in reasons for being here, I suppose.

Read full topic

item.title: Bouncy Balls
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

Why, what is so bad about it?
most of the time, the reply is something like "cause its crap"

a lot of the time its people who know java, then think that the only way to auto is making deobs, loaders, bcel or whatever it is nowdays

well let me tell you, you lot have a huge ban rate, you almost use level 3s all the time, iv heard even arga had a big ban rate, but with scar, iv seen a guy who had 4 level 85 miners, looking like normal legit players, high combat and everything.
we try to tell you about way to help, like the SRL Multiplayer Model, im sure if people used that, instead of one account for 5 days, you’d never get banned, come on, java is object oriented, you’re born for it

and if you mention scar on the IRC, you get flamed so badly… its not even funny, and if anyone says something, it doesnt even matter cause its only a scar scripter saying it…
however i accept your opinion, we here are only ye olde scar-color-clicky

Read full topic

item.title: Bouncy Balls
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

[quote=“1337h4x, post:3, topic:94730”]I hate SCAR though.[/quote]Why, what is so bad about it? In my opinion SCAR is very cool… Ok, maybe it isn’t anything at all compared to programming languages such as: C++, Java or even Delphi, but as an scripting language, it still offers alot of nice functions/procedures for script making. + The fact that it is pretty damn easy compared to programming, and scripting with SCAR can be really fun & you can make scripts quickly. But if you spend time a bit more than normally for script(s) that you script, you can make em pretty effective/handy for using…

It’s good for people like me, who doesn’t plan on moving to programming, as it would take too much of time to learn… (…I don’t want to learn thousands and thousands of commands before I can actually make something…) Or for those people who just aren’t interested of “hardcore coding”. ;D

But ok, it is your opinion and this is my opinion.

Edit: Also, I am pretty sure many people get into programming after SCAR scripting…

Read full topic
